metadata.name: Alternative Heart #1
metadata.description:
"Alternative Heart" was born through the prism of emotions experienced over time. 
I tried through this project to display as many phases of the Heart as possible. 
These hearts are unique, each of them represents a unique emotion. 
As we are different, so are our hearts.
(All NFTs are made in 4K resolution) 
Choose your heart ü§ç.
